articles.title: 'You sound like such a fun mum': Netizens riled up over mum who forbids child from eating birthday cakes in preschool - AsiaOne

articles.title: Womankind podcast finds out: What causes burnout in women? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: On the fifth episode of CNA Women's Womankind podcast, hosts Hidayah Salamat and Penelope Chan talk to former corporate lawyer and co-founder of online counselling service Talk Your Heart Out, Shilpa Jain.
articles.content: Burnout disproportionately affects women across the world. Specifically, working mothers display more symptoms of occupational burnout including feeling overwhelmed and unaccomplished than working fa… [+262 chars]

articles.title: FIFA World Cup 2022: Round of 16 fixtures confirmed after 28-year-long streak ends in frenetic group stage - India Today
articles.description: FIFA World Cup 2022: Asian and African sides produced stunning results in Qatar one of the most thrilling group stages at a World Cup came to an end on December 2. The Round of 16 fixtures were confirmed after some big names crashed out early.

articles.title: ZoukOut 2022 is finally here: Here's the full lineup for the 2-day dance music festival - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Headliners Tiesto, Zedd and Armin Van Buuren will be partying it up alongside Singaporean electronic music artiste Wukong, DJ duo Slander and dance pop DJ Gryffin at Siloso Beach Sentosa on Friday (Dec 2) and Saturday.
